Definition at line 44 of file Zip.h.

enum gaia::utility::Result
Enumerator:
UTILITY_ZIP_SUCCESS 

The operation is successful.

UTILITY_ZIP_ERROR_OPEN_FAILURE 

The zip file has not been opened.

UTILITY_ZIP_ERROR_INVALID_ARG 

Either of the following conditions has occurred.

The length of the specified directory exceeds system limitations. The specified directory contains prohibited characters. The specified directory is invalid.

UTILITY_ZIP_ERROR_FILE_NOT_FOUND 

The specified file cannot be found.

UTILITY_ZIP_ERROR_FILE_ALREADY_EXIST 

The specified file already exists in the archive, but the flag for overwriting the file is not set.

UTILITY_ZIP_FAILURE 

The operation fails.
